パッケージ xyz.mlserver.util

クラス ReflectionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.mlserver.util.ReflectionHelper
  • public final class ReflectionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helps you using reflection.

      • findMethod

        @Nullable
public static <T> @Nullable java.lang.reflect.Method findMethod​(@NotNull("clazz")
                                                                @NotNull("clazz") java.lang.Class<? extends T> clazz,
                                                                @NotNull("methodName")
                                                                @NotNull("methodName") java.lang.String methodName,
                                                                @Nullable
                                                                @Nullable java.lang.Class<?>... args)
        Find method in class.
        パラメータ:
        clazz - Class that will find method on
        methodName - Method name
        args - Class of arguments
        戻り値:
        Method if found, null otherwise

                                                                           @NotNull("methodName")
                                                                           @NotNull("methodName") java.lang.String methodName,

      • invokeMethod

        public static <T> java.lang.Object invokeMethod​(@NotNull("clazz")
                                                @NotNull("clazz") java.lang.Class<? extends T> clazz,
                                                @Nullable
                                                T instance,
                                                @NotNull("methodName")
                                                @NotNull("methodName") java.lang.String methodName,
                                                @NotNull("args")
                                                @NotNull("args") java.lang.Object... args)
                                         throws java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                                java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        Invokes method.
        パラメータ:
        clazz - Class that will invoke method on
        instance - Can be empty if static method
        methodName - Method name
        args - Arguments
        戻り値:
        Result of method
        例外:
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - If something went wrong when invoking method
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - If invocation isn't allowed
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - If couldn't method find

      • invokeMethodRecursively

                                                           @NotNull("methodName")

                                                           @NotNull("args")
                                                           @NotNull("args") java.lang.Object... args)
                                                    throws java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                                           java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                           java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        例外:
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException

      • invokeMethodWithoutException

        public static <T> java.lang.Object invokeMethodWithoutException​(@NotNull("clazz")

                                                                @NotNull("args")
                                                                @NotNull("args") java.lang.Object... args)
        Invokes method.
        パラメータ:
        clazz - Class that will invoke method on
        instance - Can be empty if static method
        methodName - Method name
        args - Arguments
        戻り値:
        Result of method, null if invoked method returned null or thrown error

      • getField

        public static <T> java.lang.Object getField​(@NotNull("clazz")
                                            @NotNull("clazz") java.lang.Class<? extends T> clazz,
                                            @Nullable
                                            T instance,
                                            @NotNull("field")
                                            @NotNull("field") java.lang.String fieldName)
                                     throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,
                                            java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Get value in field in class.
        パラメータ:
        clazz - Class that will get field on
        instance - Can be empty if field is static
        fieldName - Field name
        戻り値:
        Value of field
        例外:
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - If couldn't find field
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - If the operation isn't allowed

      • getFieldRecursively

        public static <T> void setField​(@NotNull("clazz")

                         throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,
                                java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Set value in field in class.
        パラメータ:
        clazz - Class that will get field on
        instance - Can be empty if field is static
        fieldName - Field name
        value - Value
        例外:
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - If couldn't find field
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - If the operation isn't allowed

        value - Value

      • invokeConstructor

        @NotNull
public static <T> T invokeConstructor​(@NotNull("clazz")
                                      @NotNull("clazz") java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                      @NotNull("args")
                                      @NotNull("args") java.lang.Object... args)
                               throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                      java.lang.InstantiationException
        Invoke constructor.
        パラメータ:
        clazz - Class that will invoke constructor on
        args - Arguments for invoke constructor
        戻り値:
        Result of constructor
        例外:
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - If something went wrong when invoking method
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - If invocation isn't allowed
        java.lang.InstantiationException - If can't be initialized

      • getSupers

        @NotNull
public static @NotNull ICollectionList<java.lang.Class<?>> getSupers​(@NotNull("clazz")
                                                                     @NotNull("clazz") java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Gets all super classes and super interfaces, and return them. The returned entry is not unique and may contains the duplicate entry.
        戻り値:
        the super classes and interfaces.
